title: [QUESTION] Can we use other open+closed source models with this project too ?
body:
If yes then how and if not then why not ?
Btw there is one open source project called Litellm which can easily help you integrate 100+ LLM's easily so if this project can be used with other LLM's then it will be awesome in my opinion as people will have many more options to choose from :-))
author: Greatz08

comments.body:
Together AI only supports open source LLM models. However, you can fork the repo and replace together AI integration with closed LLM model (Claude, ChatGPT etc...) of your choice.

Since Nutlope is part of Together AI, I don't think he'll be investing his time to add for something Together AI doesn't support.

title: Some Laravel Love
body:
Dear Amazing Team of LlamaCoder,

First let me salut your magic with this great work, but from my personal experience the "Nextjs cold boot time", of course coming from a PHP world.. but the community is massive.

So, it would really be very much appreciated if you do consider supporting the Laravel framework.

Thank you. #php
author: aldoyh

comments.body: Could be interesting to add in the future! I included this in my future TODOs in the README so closing for now
